p:
The tested vaccination strategy elicited potent antibody responses against influenza A group 1 HAs, but low antibody responses against H3, a group 2 HA. A complete pan-influenza virus vaccine will need to consist of a trivalent formulation that contains cHAs for group 2
14 and B influenza viruses. Such a multivalent vaccine could induce stalk-reactive antibody responses against all influenza subtypes.
